CAREER:
The first 2 years were spent in agency at a company called Spring Personnel where Will won 'Top Recruiter'. He even survived the great recession of 2008. The last 6 years he's spent in-house at companies like SGS and INC Research.
Through trial and error (heavily weighted on errors!) he discovered a new way of sourcing candidates online, mostly in social networks and using technology.
For the past few years he's been sharing this knowledge and training colleagues.
I can tell you more about... %[Social sourcing](postback:social_sourcing) %[Training](postback:training) %[Right now](postback:right_now)

EARLY CAREER: Ok, before recruitment he worked in Retail, Banking and Estate Agency. I know what you're thinking... %[Why recruitment](postback:why_recruitment) %[Nah, change subjects](postback:nah)
WHY RECRUITMENT: Great question! Well, actually Will fell into recruitment. After deciding that Banking and Estate Agency wasn't for him he went looking for something new. This is when an old friend came across Will's CV online and the rest is history. Will's now racked up over 8 years in recruitment. Where to next? %[More about Will](postback:more)
CAMPAIGNS:
He cut his teeth in agency where the streets were tough and the competition was rife! Will honed his matchmaking skills, learnt how to build a pipeline, nuturing leads and closing deals.
After 2 years and surviving a recession he moved in-house where he's evolved into a modern recruiter. He's developed skills in employer branding, talent trends, and worked on recruitment campaigns across Europe, America, Afica, and Australia.
Highlights, successfully completing campaigns in Nigeria, even war-torn Iraq.
Wanna know what he's up to right now or how he got into recruitment? %[Right now](postback:right_now) %[Before recruitment](postback:early_career) %[Nah, more factoids](postback:nah)
RIGHT NOW:
Right now, Will's working with INC Research in Talent Acquisition with a great bunch of peeps.
So far he's been a hit working with their European and Amerian teams, sharing sourcing tips and technology. He's even developed super cool and engaging contact templates that have converted candidate response rates by over 60% üëä
He's always open to new and exciting opportunities. %[The ideal job](postback:ideal_job)
IDEAL JOB:
What really excites Will is helping businesses be more creative with their recruitment through technology.
Specifically he's interested in Tech Talent roles because he excels at being the point-person and internal expert on internet sourcing and technology. %[Areas of interest](postback:areas_of_interest)

HERE FOR THE BOT: I knew it! How can I help? %[What are chatbots?](postback:what_are_chatbots?) %[Build me a bot](postback:build_me_a_bot)
WHAT ARE CHATBOTS?: Bots can simulate conversation, even automate tasks that you would normally do yourself, like making a dinner reservation. %[Why chatbots?](postback:why_chatbots?)
WHY CHATBOTS?: Great question! It‚Äôs because for the first time ever people are using messenger apps more than they are using social networks./nFor example, some bots are used to handle a variety of service requests, which normally require a telephone call or customer agent. %[Taco Bell bot](postback:taco_bell_bot) %[X.ai bot](postback:xai_bot)
TACO BELL BOT: Taco Bell recently released a bot that allows you to order and pay for tacos through an automated chat conversation.
XAI BOT: Other bots like X.ai can help schedule your meetings by simply adding the bot to your email thread.
